name: zim-news-aggregator
description: Comprehensive news aggregator for Zimbabwean media

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:user-service" "npm run dev:article-service"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:services && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: docker-compose up -d postgres redis elasticsearch && sleep 10 && npm run migrate
scripts.migrate: cd services/article-service && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.seed: cd services/article-service && npx prisma db seed
